title: Rooscier Women's Sheer Mesh Glitter Wrap V Neck Long Sleeve Ruched Drawstring Bodycon Mini Dress
description: Fabric: V neck mini dress is made of sheer mesh shiny fabric, stretchy, lightweight and comfortable, provides you a comfortable feminine touch.
Features: Sheer mesh glitter dresses features with v neck style, long sleeve, drawstring, ruched, wrap, sexy and stylish, showing off your figure and showing off your feminine curves.
Match: Long sleeve dress pair well with bag, hats, earrings necklace, thigh boots or boots, red lippy, any small accessories will make this dress more attractive.
Occasions: Drawstring dress is suitable for club, party, date night, homecoming, cocktail, dinner, beach, evening, wedding, seaside, home, shopping, vacation and other special occasion.
Please check the Rooscier's size chart carefully before placing purchase and hope you can order the perfect size for yourself.
